root.name: Disciples: Reincarnation
root.description: OverviewDisciples: Reincarnation is a single game containing overhauled versions of both Disciples 3: Renaissance and Disciples 3: Resurrection. It introduces a significant number of additions and changes to both games. The various changes and additions include the introduction of online multiplayer for Disciples 3, naval combat, while there has also been a redrawing of the environments to make the levels more open and the combat arenas smaller. Other differences from the earlier versions include a modified inventory for units, greater statistical feedback, new quests, spells, and a map editor for the creation of custom campaigns.
